alert.note: Alert for Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 03 at 6:31PM CDT until July 03 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southeast Kansas, including the following counties, Wilson and Woodson. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, city streets, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is likely. Low-water crossings may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 631 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated very heavy rain due to slow-moving thunderstorms. Flooding of creeks, streams, city streets, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is likely. Low-water crossings may not be passable. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area.
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown.
